problem.display_name: Graded question - Considerations when Configuring the WHO DQ Tool - Question 1
problem.markdown:
A data element must be in what for it to be able to be found when configuring the WHO DQ tool.
>>Select the one correct answer: (2 attempts) <<
( ) A. Data set (x) B. Data element group ( ) C. Indicator ( ) D. Category combination [explanation] Data Element Group is correct. [explanation]
